detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Skirt in a textured organic cotton weave with an elasticated waist and adjustable straps that cross at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Hairbands in a cotton weave with a bow.
Long-sleeved top in a linen weave with a V-neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in a linen weave with a V-neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in a linen weave with a V-neck. Slightly longer at the back.

Sturdy running backpack with a padded, mesh-covered back and padded, shaped shoulder straps that can be held together by an adjustable chest strap with a plastic fastener. The chest strap has a slide fastener for easy height adjustment. Wider, adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener, one large compartment with an earphone outlet and mesh side compartment and one zipped inner compartment. Elastic hanger at the top. Lined. Size 19x42 cm.
Fine-knit shaftless yoga socks with anti-slip protectors.
Fine-knit shaftless yoga socks with anti-slip protectors.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy jersey with a textured stripe. Wide, elasticated puff sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
V-neck tunic in a crinkled viscose weave with decorative buttons, a concealed fastener at the top, 3/4-length wide sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed stretch denim with lacing at the front and worn details. Zip fly and button and a raw-edge hem.

Sleeveless romper suit in patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps with fixed ties and a double-layered top. Press-studs at the crotch and short legs with elasticated frill trims at the hems.

Sleeveless romper suit in patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps with fixed ties and a double-layered top. Press-studs at the crotch and short legs with elasticated frill trims at the hems.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed slub cotton jersey. Shoulder straps with a decorative bow.

Bomber jacket woven in a nylon blend with a stand-up collar with a decorative zip and tab with press-studs. Zip down the front, a chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket with a concealed press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Bomber jacket woven in a nylon blend with a stand-up collar with a decorative zip and tab with press-studs. Zip down the front, a chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket with a concealed press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Cylindrical sports bag in woven fabric with a zip and two handles at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with a carabiner hook at each end. Zipped outer compartment on one short side, a zipped inner compartment and a small pocket. Lined.
5-pocket sturdy washed denim jeans in a loose fit with a high waist, button fly, low crotch and straight legs.
Wide, high-waisted jeans in washed denim with a concealed zip at the front, detachable tie belt with loops at the waist, front and back pockets and straight legs that flare to the hem.
Wide, high-waisted jeans in washed denim with a concealed zip at the front, detachable tie belt with loops at the waist, front and back pockets and straight legs that flare to the hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a shimmering coating and a zip in one side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with 3/4-length sleeves that are open at the top and have ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with 3/4-length sleeves that are open at the top and have ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with 3/4-length sleeves that are open at the top and have ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jersey push-up bras with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, no fasteners.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.

Short V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon with gathers and a small frill at the shoulders, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with frilled tiers. Lined.

Short V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon with gathers and a small frill at the shoulders, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with frilled tiers. Lined.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck at the back and short, wide sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats and a tie belt, and a straight-cut skirt with slits in the sides. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck at the back and short, wide sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats and a tie belt, and a straight-cut skirt with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Fitted jacket in a patterned weave with notch lapels, a covered button at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in a soft, printed weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Pockets in the side seams and straight-cut legs with creases.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in a soft, printed weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Pockets in the side seams and straight-cut legs with creases.
Calf-length skirt in airy patterned chiffon with a concealed zip, hook-and-eye fastening at the back, two seams and a wide flounce at the hem. Lined at the top.
T-shirts in slub cotton jersey with a print motif.
Glasses with no lenses and glittery plastic frames.
Glasses with no lenses and glittery plastic frames.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Low waist and skinny legs.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Low waist and skinny legs.

Sports vest top in fast-drying, hole-patterned, functional fabric with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless.
Sports vest top in fast-drying, hole-patterned, functional fabric with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless.
Short dress in a sturdy crêpe weave with a V-neck at the front, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam under the bust. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in a pima cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pocket with a concealed button, concealed pockets in the side seams. and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in a pima cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pocket with a concealed button, concealed pockets in the side seams. and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a stand-up collar with long, decorative ties and concealed buttons at the front. Pleats at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Straight-cut shirt in a pima cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Straight-cut shirt in a pima cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Short, sleeveless top in jersey containing glittery threads in a narrow cut at the top with an opening and buttons at the back of the neck.

Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and contrasting colour stripes down the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length, flared skirt in soft imitation suede with a press-stud and concealed zip at the back and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.

Jacquard-knit jumper in a soft modal and cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Mesh trainers with rubber and imitation leather details, a padded edge and lacing at the front. Decorative grosgrain trim with a text print along the tongue and back of the heel. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
